aka: 泰德拉索：错棚教练趣事多

cast.name: 杰森·苏戴奇斯 Jason Sudeikis
汉娜·沃丁厄姆 Hannah Waddingham
杰里米·斯威夫特 Jeremy Swift

director.name: 伊斯拉·埃德尔曼 Ezra Edelman

this_title: Ted Lasso: The Missing Christmas Mustache
trans_title: 足球教练圣诞特别短片
泰德拉索：错棚教练趣事多
introduction: Ted Lasso has returned to spread some holiday cheer.Apple’s Emmy-winning comedy series has released a brand-new, holiday-themed short that builds upon the stop-motion animated opening credits featured in season two’s beloved Christmas episode.The four-minute short features the cast — Jason Sudeikis (Ted), Hannah Waddingham (Rebecca), Brendan Hunt (Coach Beard), Jeremy Swift (Higgins), Juno Temple (Keeley), Brett Goldstein (Roy), Phil Dunster (Jamie) and Nick Mohammed (Nate) — reprising their roles in Claymation form. The special, like the series itself, features Ted, in his own way, delivering an important message about the holidays.
chinese_title: 足球教练圣诞特别短片
foreign_title: Ted Lasso: The Missing Christmas Mustache
